Text.val: 17.10.2014 SH SCR19231 Added QFL_CALL 4/5
03.06.2014 SH SCR18866 Fixed issue when p.JOBSCDTIME > 24:00:00, then job is started at next day, startime - 24:00:00
17.04.2014 SH SCR18825 Removed test to skip creating JOBL rows if PI.Public name <> v.JobName (only relevant if PI.Public name
start with 'QUEUE'). Result is now that also for QUEUE programs (system jobs) JOBL rows are created
Also v.JobName is now prepared independently from first 5 pos. of PI.Public name
02.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
30.09.2012 LB Introduce New Parameter: Skeep Java Load
14.11.2010 LB Implementation of Application Server
25.08.2010 SH SCR15721 Extended update of v.JobName to be unique if jobs
are running on the same system for diff. databases
09.07.2010 SH SCR15643 Set p.MGPRM0 = '0' if blank
10.08.2009 SH SCR14722 Reset SEQN_LASTUSEDNUMBER if >999.999
10.06.2009 LB Add New Logical Name: SBMJOB CL Version in order to use different
CL programs for V9 and UniPaas
14.04.2009 SH SCR14463 Removed call old debugger version6
17.07.2008 LB If USER(0) = '' (In case of iBolt) set USER = MAGIC in the const
Parameters sring
04.01.2006 BT SCR9910 changed p.JOBQUEUE to INIGET
14.10.2005 BT SCR9250 added frequent call for QFL_CALL and changed name
of QFL_CALL jobs. Original program is in folder BACKUP.
11.02.2005 BT SCR7742 added new Parameter HOLDJOB
10.02.2005 BT SCR7742 change 'v.Jobdate and Time'
09.02.2004 BT add new fields to JOBL: JOBQ, PTY,SCCD, SCCT
3.05.2003 LB Submit Job with User=Job Name
22-Apr-2003 LB Change UDF to @mgeac32.ISERIES
16-APR-2003 AS, skipping access check for IFS directory by setting parameter
pi.SkipAccessCheck of UFB533 to 'T'L
14-OCT-2002 AS, using server's date time for the s"submitted" log to avoid
inaccuracy between server and client date/time
LB. add new parameter -SBMD - System Date at Submit job
14.-Apr-2010 LB. Implement STRUNISVR
-Public Name of the Called Program
-Number of Parameters (Alpha 2)
-29 Parameters (Alpha 255)
-- Set schedule date/time
-- Set total number of parameter to '0' if passed as blank. Workaround due to a
problem with resubmit of serverjobs in Unipaas, see SCR15643
-Retrieve AS/400 System Name
-Retrieve Magic Env - Library Name of RPG/CL/JOBQ/SBSD objects
-Retrieve Parameter Separator
Parameters are sent to the server trough DTAARA in one string of
1999 char. Separator comes to be a token between the parameters.
#GB700 uses this token in order to split the string into the parameters.
-Retrieve Magic/400 Server Library
-Retrieve FL database collection Name
-retrieve FL IFS directory
-Find Job Property for the Submeted Program
Skip for system programs
Retrieve system date
Retrieve name of the mff file on AS/400
- For the System Jobs use System Job Queue
- System Job is always started with 'QFL'
- If Job Queue is not found, Take JOBQ2
-If Job Name is not found, use Public name
If started from AS/400, add unique extention to the QFL_CALLn
-If Public Name is QFL_CALL1, QFL_CALL2, QFL_CALL3, QFL_CALL4 or QFL_CALL5 override to QF_CALL
- If Job Queue Priority is not found use priority 5
Retrieve path of log files
- Required Server Parameters (Used by Engine)
The Sequence of the Parameters is synchronized with CL program - MGSRVSBM !!!
-LogName Parameter MUST be the same as the Job Name !!!
-Optional Parameters (Used by Program itself)
- Submit Job
10.02.2005 BT SCR7742 change 'v.Jobdate and Time'
11.02.2005 BT SCR7742 added new Parameter HOLDJOB
New Method of Submit Job. Valid as from UniPaas1.8 only!!!
Step1: Create status Data Area in FLDTx library
Step2: Call STRUNISVR Interface
- Retrive Job Number and AS/400 User and create a record in Log File

ExpSyntax.val: 'SBMJOB CMD(CALL PGM('&Trim ({0,43})&'/'&Trim ({0,66})&') PARM('''&Trim ({0,44})&''' '''&Trim ({0,49})&''' '''&Trim ({0,47})&''' '''&Str (Len (RTrim ({0,47})),'3P0')&''')) JOB('&Trim ({0,50})&') JOBD('&Trim ({0,44})&'/MGSERVER) JOBQ('&Trim ({0,45})&') JOBPTY('&{0,53}&') USER('&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]DftUser'))&')'
MlsTrans ('Error in Submit Job, see Job Log')

Text.val: see Comand SBMJOB
10.02.2005 BT SCR7742 change 'v.Jobdate and Time'
11.02.2005 BT SCR7742 added new Parameter HOLDJOB
14.11.2010. Application Server Setup
... reset sequenece number, max. 5 characters are reserved for the number
in the jobname string, which is passed to the i5
... reset sequenece number, max. 6 characters are reserved for the number
in the jobname string, which is passed to the i5

SQL_STMT_U.val: UPDATE :1/SEQN SET SEQN_LASTUSEDNUMBER = 0 WHERE SEQN_CODE =':2' WITH NC
